original: Bonde, Christer, greve, kammarherre, Växjö, f. 12/12/69 i Sthlm av greve Carl Trolle-B. o. frih :an Eva Leijon-hufvud. G. 99 m. Lula Ekestubbe. Barn: Ulf f. 02, Gustaf 04, Torkel 05, Ulla 09. — Tjg. kammarh. h. H. M. Drottningen 09-29. Verkst. dir. i A-B Hässelby Egend., inneh. Theleborgs fideikommiss sed. 18, äg. Thureholm i Södermani. Andre v. ordf. i Johanni-terorden i Sverige. GV:sJmt, kN02kl. RVO, R-RJohO, KDD02gr.
translated: Bonde, Christer is a Count, Chamberlain, born on December 12, 1969 in Stockholm to Count Carl Trolle-B. and Baroness Eva Leijon-hufvud. He married Lula Ekestubbe in 1999 and they have four children: Ulf born in 2002, Gustaf in 2004, Torkel in 2005, and Ulla in 2009. He served as a Chamberlain for Her Majesty the Queen from 1909 to 1929 and is currently the Managing Director of A-B Hässelby Estate, owner of Theleborg's Trust since 1918 and Thureholm in Södermani. He also served as the Deputy Chairman for the Swedish Johanni Order. He was awarded GV:sJmt, kN02kl, RVO, R-RJohO, KDD02gr.

memberOf.name: Swedish Order of the Polar Star
